availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Milton P. Buster (Judge and senator for Wayne, Pulaski, and Clinton counties)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, politician. Married Louisa L. Buster. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1861 to 1864.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Milton P. Buster (1824-1864)," Memorial #93627948, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=93627948&ref=acom (accessed April 27, 2017). "Resolutions Upon the Death of Judge M.P. Buster," in Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, Passed at the Session Which was Begun and Held in the City of Frankfort on Monday, the Seventh Day of December, 1863, (Frankfort, KY: The Commonwealth Office, 1864), 153. Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1874), 754.
